Instruction: Preheat oven to 400Â°F. Place bacon slices on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes or until crispy. Remove from oven and let cool.
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Grill over medium-high heat for 6-8 minutes per side or until cooked through. Let rest for a few minutes, then slice thinly.
Chop lettuce into bite-sized pieces and arrange on a large serving platter.
Arrange sliced grilled chicken, diced avocado, sliced hard-boiled eggs, tomato wedges, crumbled bacon, and crumbled blue cheese on top of the lettuce in rows.
In a small bowl, whisk together red wine vinegar, Dijon mustard, olive oil, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad or serve on the side.
